title: Old Video of PM Modi Meeting His Mother Shared with False Claim
subtitle: PM Narendra Modi Meets Mother Heeraben Modi Viral Video: Fact checking viral video on social media claims that Prime Minister Narendra Modi met his mother recently. However, the claim is false. The video is actually from 2014.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on social media claims that Prime Minister Narendra Modi met his mother Heeraben Modi recently. The video was shared on Friday, 24 May. The claim along with the viral video reads: ‘पीएम मोदी माँ से मिलने पहुंचे तो देखिये क्या हुआ वहां उनके साथ’’

Namo Supporter’s Facebook page shared the viral video with a similar claim and received an engagement of 1,57,000 views and over 2,900 shares at the time this article was written.
